Name: Models for automatic g2p for Icelandic (20.10)
Description: These are grapheme-to-phoneme models for Icelandic, trained on an encoder-decoder LSTM neural network. The models are delivered with scripts for automatic transcription of Icelandic in the standard pronunciation variation, in the northern variation, north-east variation, and the south variation. To run the scripts the user needs to install Fairseq.
